game.title: Echoes of Eternity
game.synopsis: In a world where time has broken down, fragments of past and future converge in the small town of Ashwood. Players take on the role of a Chronomancer, tasked with mending the fabric of time.
game.beginning: The game begins with the player's character stumbling upon an ancient artifact known as the "Echokeeper." This mysterious object allows the player to see glimpses of past and future events in Ashwood.
game.ending: After unraveling the mysteries of Ashwood, the Chronomancer must face off against a powerful entity known only as "The Devourer," which has been feeding on the fabric of time. The fate of the town and the universe hangs in the balance.
